statements: SELECT city_name, median_house_price FROM GentrificationImpact;
SELECT city_id, city_name, gentrification_factor FROM GentrificationImpact ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_id, city_name, median_house_price, gentrification_factor FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE median_house_price > 500000;
SELECT * FROM GentrificationImpact ORDER BY gentrification_factor DESC;
SELECT city_name, median_house_price FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE gentrification_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY median_house_price DESC;
SELECT city_name, median_house_price FROM GentrificationImpact ORDER BY median_house_price DESC
SELECT city_name, gentrification_factor FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE median_house_price > 50000
SELECT city_name, median_house_price, gentrification_factor FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE city_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE gentrification_factor >= 0.5 ORDER BY gentrification_factor ASC
SELECT city_name, median_house_price, gentrification_factor FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE city_name LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, neighborhood, housing_price FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE gentrification_level > 2 ORDER BY housing_price DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM gentrification_trends WHERE city='San Francisco' ORDER BY trend_year ASC;
SELECT city, MAX(housing_price) AS max_price FROM impact_of_gentrification GROUP BY city;
SELECT AVG(gentrification_level) AS avg_level, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM impact_of_gentrification;
SELECT city, neighborhood, housing_price FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE gentrification_level = 5 ORDER BY housing_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE city = 'New York' AND neighborhood = 'Brooklyn' AND gentrification_level > 3;
SELECT city, AVG(housing_price) AS avg_price FROM impact_of_gentrification GROUP BY city ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT city, trend_year, trend_description FROM gentrification_trends WHERE city = 'San Francisco' AND trend_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE gentrification_level = (SELECT MAX(gentrification_level) FROM impact_of_gentrification);
SELECT city, neighborhood, year, price FROM housing_prices WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood, population FROM demographics WHERE city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT * FROM gentrification WHERE gentrification_year = 2021;
SELECT city, neighborhood, median_income FROM demographics WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT city, property_type, price FROM housing_prices WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY city, price;
SELECT * FROM housing_prices ORDER BY price DESC, year ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, neighborhood, price FROM housing_prices WHERE year=2020 AND price < 500000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT city, neighborhood, year, property_type, price FROM housing_prices WHERE year=2019 AND property_type='Apartment' ORDER BY city, price DESC;
SELECT city, neighborhood, price, median_income FROM housing_prices hp JOIN demographics d ON hp.city=d.city AND hp.neighborhood=d.neighborhood WHERE price > 1000000 ORDER BY city, neighborhood;

SELECT h.city, h.neighborhood, h.price, g.impact_rating FROM housing_prices h JOIN gentrification g ON h.city=g.city AND h.neighborhood=g.neighborhood WHERE g.gentrification_year > 2015 ORDER BY h.city, h.neighborhood, g.impact_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM housing_prices;
SELECT location, avg_price FROM housing_prices ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT location, year, gentrification_score FROM gentrification_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT location, population FROM demographic_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT location, income, employment_rate FROM economic_data WHERE income > 50000 AND employment_rate >= 80;
SELECT * FROM housing_prices ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT location, year, avg_price FROM housing_prices WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT location, year, population FROM demographic_data WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT * FROM economic_data WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY employment_rate DESC;
SELECT location, year, gentrification_score FROM gentrification_data WHERE gentrification_score >= 3.5;
SELECT * FROM urban_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, city_name, gentrification_status FROM urban_areas WHERE gentrification_status = 'Gentrified';
SELECT area_name, city_name, gentrification_status FROM urban_areas WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM gentrification_factors WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE total_population > 50000;
SELECT * FROM urban_areas;
SELECT area_name, city_name, gentrification_status FROM urban_areas ORDER BY gentrification_status ASC;
SELECT area_name, median_income FROM urban_areas INNER JOIN demographics ON urban_areas.area_id = demographics.area_id WHERE total_population > 500000;
SELECT area_name, property_type, price FROM urban_areas INNER JOIN housing_prices ON urban_areas.area_id = housing_prices.area_id WHERE price > 1000000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM gentrification_factors WHERE area_id = 2;
